Class Request

java.lang.Object
entity.EntityObject
entity.request.Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
MedicineRequest
public abstract class Request extends EntityObject
Abstract class representing a request within the system, which can be approved, rejected, or pending. This class contains common properties shared by all request types, such as requestor, approver, status, and timestamps for creation and modification.

    Enum representing the possible statuses of a request.

  • Constructor Details

    • Request

      public Request()
      Default constructor for the Request class.

    • Request

      public Request(String id, String requestorId, String approverId, Request.STATUS status, LocalDateTime timeCreated, LocalDateTime timeModified)
      Constructor to initialize a new Request with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the request.
      requestorId - The ID of the person making the request.
      approverId - The ID of the person who will approve or reject the request.
      status - The current status of the request (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED).
      timeCreated - The timestamp when the request was created.
      timeModified - The timestamp when the request was last modified.
